title: Code of Jewish law = (Kitzur schulchan aruch) : a compilation of Jewish laws and customs / by Solomon Ganzfried ; translated by Hyman E. Goldin.
author: Ganzfried, Solomon ben Joseph, 1804-1886.

title: Sefer emunot ṿe-deʻot / le-Rav Saʻadyah Gaʼon ; heʻetiḳo ʻIvrit R. Yehudah ibn Tibon, ʻim beʼur ṿe-heʻarot.,‏ספר אמונות ודעות /‏ ‏לרב סעדיה גאון ; העתיקו עברית יהודה אבן תבון, ים באור והערות.
author: Saʻadia ben Joseph, 882-942., ‏סעדיה,‏ ‏גאון.

title: Judaism; a manual for the instruction of proselytes, prepared by the Central conference of American rabbis.
author: Central Conference of American Rabbis.
